scripts.deploy-dbpoc-static: npm run use-production && aws s3 cp ./src/assets s3://productdb.medten.com --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive
scripts.package-dbpoc: npm run use-production && sam package --profile medten --template-file sam-dbpoc.yaml --output-template-file package-dbpoc.yaml --s3-bucket med10-staging
scripts.deploy-dbpoc: aws cloudformation deploy --profile medten --template-file package-dbpoc.yaml --stack-name dbpoc
